revised_title: Iris Motions and Nervous System Interactions
tldr: This article examines the iris and its motions, focusing on the role of the nervous system in controlling the contraction and dilation of the pupil. The author discusses the influence of various nerves, including the sympathetic system, and how mental impressions and stimuli can affect the iris. The study also explores the effects of irritation, division, and galvanic currents on the nerves and their impact on the iris.
